mapper.insert: insert into khy_board2(bno, bid, btitle, bcontent, bregdate, bupdatedate, bhit, bdeleteyn) values(#{bno}, #{bid}, #{btitle}, #{bcontent}, sysdate, sysdate, 0, 'Y')
mapper.select: select * from khy_board2 where bdeleteyn = 'Y' order by bno desc
